tool_description: Analyzes gene expression patterns across tissues, conditions, and time points to identify tissue-specific targets and expression profiles relevant for therapeutic targeting.

expression_matrix.description: Path to gene expression matrix file

sample_annotations.description: Path to sample annotation file with tissue/condition labels

target_genes.description: List of genes to analyze expression patterns for

analysis_type.description: Analysis focus: tissue_specificity, temporal_dynamics, or condition_response

error_messages: Expression file not accessible: Check expression_matrix file path and permissions.
Sample annotation mismatch: Sample IDs don't match between expression matrix and annotations.
Target genes not found: Some genes in target_genes list not present in expression data.
Invalid analysis type: Use tissue_specificity, temporal_dynamics, or condition_response.
usage: Provide expression_matrix, sample_annotations, and target_genes list. Choose analysis_type based on research focus. Returns expression pattern analysis and tissue/condition specificity metrics.

tissue_specificity_scores.description: Tissue specificity scores for each target gene

expression_patterns.description: Described expression patterns for each gene

top_expressing_tissues.description: Tissues with highest expression for each gene

pattern_summary.description: Summary of key expression pattern findings
